name: EYE OF UURN
description:
UURN HAS LOST HIS EYE

YOU HAVE BEEN SENT TO GET IT

In this strategic puzzle game, draw the path you will take with your ship. Solve the riddles of the Aazark temple to find UURN's eye.

[Length] About 15 to 30min
[Controls] Mouse to Draw and Shoot.  R to Restart a level
